---
title: "Player"
format: html
params:
  player_name: "DEFAULT"
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(plotly)

player_name <- params$player_name

summary <- read_csv("data/derived/player_summary.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  filter(player == player_name)

by_ls <- read_csv("data/derived/player_by_league_season.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  filter(player == player_name)

bat_phase <- read_csv("data/derived/player_phase_batting.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  filter(player == player_name, league == "ALL", season == "ALL")

bowl_phase <- read_csv("data/derived/player_phase_bowling.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  filter(player == player_name, league == "ALL", season == "ALL")

summary

plot_ly(bat_phase, x = ~phase, y = ~strike_rate, type = "bar", name = "Batting SR")
plot_ly(bowl_phase, x = ~phase, y = ~economy_rate, type = "bar", name = "Bowling Econ")
```
